title: Chapter 1 Quiz: Programming Fundamentals
description: Multiple choice and short answer questions covering basic programming concepts including variables, operators, and conditional statements.

title: Midterm Quiz: Data Structures
description: Comprehensive assessment covering arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, and trees. Includes both theoretical questions and practical coding problems.

title: Weekly Quiz: Algorithms & Complexity
description: Short quiz on algorithm analysis, Big-O notation, and common sorting algorithms. Focus on understanding time and space complexity.
